document.full_text: holder francesca schiavone recovered from a torrid start to beat russian 14th seed anastasia pavlyuchenkova 1-6 7-5 7-5 and book her place into the french open semi-finals on tuesday.
document.title: schiavone labors into french open semi-finals
lines_and_colors: holder francesca schiavone recovered from a torrid start to beat russian 14th seed anastasia pavlyuchenkova 1-6 7-5 7-5 and book her place into the french open semi-finals on tuesday.
